newsitem.title: ALBANIA: Albanian gets jail for selling Hoxha works.
newsitem.headline: Albanian gets jail for selling Hoxha works.

text.p: An ethnic Albanian from the neighbouring Serbian province of Kosovo has been jailed for selling works by late communist dictator Enver Hoxha in the Albanian capital Tirana, Koha Jone newspaper reported on Friday.
A Tirana court judge sentenced Nusret Recice to ten months in jail after he pleaded guilty to "distributing and trading unconstitutional materials", the paper said.
Recice, who lives in Tirana, was arrested in May for selling Hoxha's works, reports of party congresses and memoirs of the dead dictator from his kiosk.
"I knew selling the ex-dictator's works was prohibited but I sold them to earn something," Recice said.
Hoxha, a rigid Stalinist, ruled Albania with an iron grip from the end of World War Two until his death in 1985.
